title: Textbook publishing revenue in the U.S. 2010 to 2018
summary: This statistic shows the revenue of bloomin ' brands worldwide from 2010 to 2018 . In 2018 , dupont generated some 24.5 billion u.s. dollars of revenue . dupont , with full name E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company , was a U.S.-based company , and one of the largest companies in this industry worldwide .
gold: The timeline presents data on textbook publishing revenue generated in the United States from 2010 to 2018 . In 2018 , the revenue amounted to 8.79 billion U.S. dollars .
